name: Travel Company Helper
author: scorpionthemes

sections.description:
Used for Travel Company theme for custom post types and Frontpage section in customizer.

Download Travel company
sections.installation:
1. Unzip the travel-company-helper.zip.
  2. Upload the file to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  3. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Unzip the travel-company-helper.zip.
  2. Upload the file to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  3. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress.

Why to use this plugin ?

To have extra feature for Travel Company theme Section
